analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.refundUnconfirmed (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#696-717):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.GetPermissionsList(msg.sender) == 1) (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#699-700)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#701-705)
tokens in Crowdsale.procureTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#643) is a local variable never initialiazed
backAmount in Crowdsale.procureTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#644) is a local variable never initialiazed

bonus in Crowdsale.getRateIcoWithBonus (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#610-611) is a local variable never initialiazed

Crowdsale.procureTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#639-683) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#673-674)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.SetPermissionsList (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol):
	External calls:
	- sign = token.GetPermissionsList(_address) (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol)
	- token.SetPermissionsList(_address,_sign) (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- unconfirmedSum (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol)
	- unconfirmedSumAddr (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol)

	External calls:
	- token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#673-674)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.refundUnconfirmed (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#696-717):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.GetPermissionsList(msg.sender) == 1) (/unique_chucks/26/0x443cd38fe8a08f670df8d95ec4eae4273a4353e1.sol#699-700)
